snippet.title: Exciting NEW beat-'em-up FINAL VENDETTA revealed!
snippet.description:
Numskull Games is delighted to reveal Final Vendetta, the latest game from Bitmap Bureau, is arriving on PC and consoles in May 2022!

Final Vendetta is a side-scrolling beat ‘em up, paying homage to the iconic arcade titles of 
the 80’s and 90’s such as Double Dragon and Final Fight. Playable either in solo or co-op 
mode, Final Vendetta pulls no punches, with a unique story, four different game modes and 
a thumping dance/techno soundtrack by Featurecast which also features four exclusive 
tracks from 90’s chart-topping electronic dance duo, Utah Saints.

Final Vendetta will be released digitally on all platforms including Steam and 
Xbox with physical editions being available for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo 
Switch - including a limited run of special editions featuring exclusive merchandise.

More information will be revealed soon. Follow NumskullGames on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NumskullGames for the latest updates - retailer links will be made available on the Numskull Games website closer to the release date: https://numskullgames.com/

To stay up-to-date follow our social channels:
https://twitter.com/NumskullGames
https://www.facebook.com/gaming/numskullgames
